description: Table containing crosslist for AS-PL alternator numbers and OEM numbers

columns.name: as_no
columns.description: This column represents the AS-PL Article of the alternator. IMPORTANT NOTE: Search operations MUST be performed using pandas string search functions (.str.contains(), .str.match(), etc.) and be case insensitive. When filtering, do not compare with equality - instead use string matching methods to check if the target value is present in the string.

columns.name: ref_name
columns.description: This column represents the name of the alternator's manufacturer. IMPORTANT NOTE: Search operations MUST be performed using pandas string search functions (.str.contains(), .str.match(), etc.) and be case insensitive. When filtering, do not compare with equality - instead use string matching methods to check if the target value is present in the string.

columns.name: ref_no
columns.description: This columns represents the original number of alternator
